description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov celebrates his birthday on March 21. He is known for his unique style, combining flexibility, firmness, and strategic thinking. Throughout his career, he has strengthened international relations, contributed to global peace and security, and earned respect from colleagues and foreign delegates alike.
original:
“Only a beginner is allowed to lose his head when he first encounters an insurmountable dead end and gives up. And, thank God, I have seen a lot over the decades of diplomatic service. Patience, which is necessary for any person, is especially valued in our profession. It's hard to piss me off. But it’s not worth checking” - Sergey Lavrov.
Show more
Today, March 21, the head of the Russian diplomatic corps, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov, celebrates his birthday. It combines the flexibility of Alexander Gorchakov, the firmness and determination of Andrei Gromyko and the strategic thinking of Yevgeny Primakov, decorated with the cherry on the cake - Lavrov’s unique style.
Over the years of work in his post, Sergei Viktorovich managed to strengthen old and build new international relations, influence the strengthening of global peace and security.
Within the framework of the International Affairs Committee, we constantly cooperate with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Thanks to his high professionalism, wisdom and dedication to his work, Sergei Viktorovich achieved deep respect and recognition not only from colleagues from Russia, but also from prominent foreign delegates. And his elegance, sharp humor and charisma win the hearts of ordinary people around the world!
I express my personal gratitude to Sergei Viktorovich for all the efforts he made to help me return to my homeland. Your contribution to helping citizens in trouble abroad is invaluable.
Sergey Viktorovich, please accept our sincere congratulations! We wish you new diplomatic victories, significant meetings, good health, prosperity to you and your loved ones!

description: The Soyuz-2.1a launch rockets with the Soyuz MS-25 spacecraft were canceled due to a voltage drop in the chemical current source. The launch has been rescheduled for March 23 at 15:36 Moscow time.

description: A court in Labytnangi rejected Navalny's mother's claim for inadequate medical care for Alexei Navalny, stating that the rights of Navalny's mother were not violated by the employees of the colony in Kharp.
original:
The court rejected Navalny's mother's claim for inadequate medical care for Alexei. The court in Labytnangi terminated administrative proceedings in the case of improper provision of medical care for Alexei Navalny. This was reported by the head of FBK, Ivan Zhdanov.

In its decision, the court claims that the rights of Navalny’s mother were not violated in any way by the employees of the colony in Kharp, and the claim should have been filed by the deceased Navalny himself. “Alexey filed claims against the colonies many times for failure to provide medical care. The claims were denied. Now he was killed, the claim is being denied to his relatives with mocking wording,” writes Zhdanov. event: ABBA Members Receive Order of Vasa
description: King Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden has awarded the members of ABBA - Benny Andersson, Anni-Frida Reus (Lingstad), Björn Ulvaeus and Agnetha Fältskog - with the Order of Vasa for their outstanding services in Swedish and international musical life.
original:
King Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden has decided to award the members of the legendary group ABBA - Benny Andersson, Anni-Frida Reus (Lingstad), Björn Ulvaeus and Agnetha Fältskog - with the Order of Vasa, the government chancellery reports. According to it, the proposal was prepared by the Order Council at the Order Chancellery His Majesty, after which it was supported by the Cabinet of Ministers. The Order of Vasa is one of four orders of chivalry (also the Order of the Sword, the Order of the Northern Star and the Order of the Seraphim), which are awarded for outstanding deeds, exploits and manifestations of qualities, such as courage in saving a human life, for a scientific feat or contribution of great importance to the country.

Royal Orders of Knighthood are being awarded to Swedes for the first time in almost 50 years, the press release explains. The musicians were awarded them "for outstanding services in Swedish and international musical life"

Zhabogadyuking in temporarily occupied Berdyansk reaches a cultural level, so to speak.

event: Preventive Work on Main Water Pipeline
description: Luganskvoda carried out scheduled repair work on a main water pipeline, affecting over 90,000 residents in Alchevsk, Stakhanov, Bryanka, Slavyanoserbsky, and Perevalsky districts. The work, involving 30 employees and 12 special units, aims to reduce accidents and increase the reliability of the water supply network.
original:
Luganskvoda is carrying out preventive work on the main water pipeline to increase the reliability of the network.
On March 21, specialists from the Alchevsk Department of the State Unitary Enterprise LPR "Luganskvoda" carried out scheduled repair work on one of the main waterways. More than 90 thousand people receive resources through this water pipeline.
Show more
residents of Alchevsk, Stakhanov, Bryanka, Slavyanoserbsky and Perevalsky municipal districts.
More than 30 employees and 12 special units are involved in the work. technology.
During the period of work, the enterprise is forced to limit the water supply to a number of settlements in the Republic.
Restoring the previous regime and volume of water supply will be carried out in stages and will last approximately until March 23.
The implementation of measures will reduce the accident rate on the water pipeline and increase the reliability of the water supply network.

event: Limited Military Operation in Belgorod and Kursk Regions
description: The Russian Volunteer Corps, Legion “Freedom of Russia”, and Siberian Battalion conducted a limited military operation in the Belgorod and Kursk regions, liberating two settlements from the Putin regime. The operation resulted in significant losses for Putin's army, including over a thousand soldiers and a large amount of equipment.
location: Belgorod, Belgorod Oblast, Russia; Kursk, Kursk Oblast, Russia
original:
Joint statement of the Russian Volunteer Corps, the Legion “Freedom of Russia” and the Siberian Battalion on the results of a limited military operation in the Belgorod and Kursk regions.

Our liberation movement once again demonstrated the strength and power of the spirit and weapons of the Russian volunteer and the weakness of the Putin regime. Together with our comrades, we proved to the whole world that Putin is losing control over the situation more and more every day and is no longer able to protect even the borders of his own country.

The Russian militia liberated two settlements from the Putin regime in a few days. Putin’s army lost a huge amount of equipment and over a thousand of its soldiers, whom they threw in panic to be slaughtered under our guns. But as a result, even at a critical moment for his power - the days of the presidential elections, Putin’s entire army was unable to resist us.
The Kremlin failed to hold elections in areas where real war was taking place.
Citizens of the Belgorod and Kursk regions did not go to the polling stations under the bombs of Putin's aircraft and artillery fire. No one in their right mind will be able to claim after this that Putin was “elected” legally.

Vladimir Putin has lost the remnants of his legitimacy, power is slipping from his hands. He controls fewer and fewer processes in Russia, Russians see this and more and more compatriots are joining our ranks. Soon we will go to other cities.

We call on Russians from all countries to join us and fight together against the Putin dictatorship. Only with arms in hand, being together, we will definitely win and create a new Russia: a strong, peaceful and respected country, of which there is no shame in being a citizen.

Our fight continues! There will be new victories! Join the RDK

event: Hungary Blocks Russian Assets for Ukraine
description: Hungary has blocked the use of Russian assets for military assistance to Ukraine, and is now blackmailing the EU to lift monetary sanctions imposed on it. German political scientist Alexander Rahr believes Hungary will eventually agree with the EU's common line in exchange for funds.
original:
Hungary, having blocked the use of Russian assets for military assistance to Ukraine, switched to blackmailing the EU, says German political scientist Alexander Rahr.

“Budapest wants all monetary sanctions that Brussels previously imposed against Hungary to be lifted immediately. Therefore, one can always expect that Orban will ultimately agree with the EU’s common line in exchange for funds from the common treasury of the association,” he told the VZGLYAD newspaper.

The interlocutor noted that the use of Russian assets by Europeans to support Ukraine would create a dangerous legal precedent.

“I think the decision will be delayed or even postponed. On the other hand, the topic of supporting Ukraine evokes a lot of emotions among EU politicians, so they are capable of irrational actions, even to the detriment of Europe,” Rahr explained. Subscribe to VZGLYAD

event: Proposal to Use Russian Frozen Assets for Ukraine
description: German Chancellor Scholz proposed using proceeds from Russian frozen assets to support Ukraine, specifically for acquiring weapons and ammunition. The European Commission approved the proposal, which will be considered at the EU summit.
original:
“Proceeds from Russian assets belong to no one, so they can be used for military aid to Ukraine.” This statement was made by German Chancellor Scholz in Brussels at the EU summit.

“We are talking about income that does not belong to anyone, and therefore can be used by the European Union. In my opinion, they should first of all be used to enable the acquisition of weapons and ammunition that Ukraine needs. It is important to me that we give this use a clear direction,” said the Chancellor.

The European Commission previously approved a proposal to use proceeds from Russian frozen assets to support Ukraine. It will be considered at the EU summit. EU High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy Borrell said the proposal included using 90% of the proceeds. And 10% will go to the EU budget. https://vk.com/video-66833222_456300795VkVideo by Gorlovka Self-Defensevk video

event: Lancet Strikes in Northeast Military District
description: The number of confirmed Lancet strikes in the Northeast Military District has exceeded 1,300. The Lancets have destroyed 394 targets and damaged 695, with the highest intensity of strikes observed in February 2024. The drones have been used extensively, targeting self-propelled and towed guns, tanks, and light armored vehicles.
original:
The number of confirmed Lancet strikes in the Northeast Military District has exceeded 1,300. The Lostarmour portal has published updated statistics on the use of Lancet kamikaze drones in the Northeast Military District.

The number of confirmed cases has reached 1300. The destruction of 394 targets by the Lancets and the damage to another 695 were confirmed by video. The maximum intensity of strikes - 162 - was observed in February 2024. The geography of use of drones is extensive: from Odessa to Chernigov.

The Lancets of the Russian Airborne Forces are most widely used - more than a quarter of the cases included in the statistics. Priority targets: self-propelled and towed guns, tanks, then, by a wide margin, light armored vehicles.

In more than 50 percent of cases, the use of the Lancet led to damage to the target, and in 30 percent, to destruction. About 10 percent each are due to misses and an unknown outcome.
